body_html:
Maybe something like this for tf.reset_default_graph?:


def example():
   c = tf.constant(4.0)
   assert c.graph is tf.get_default_graph()
   
   tf.reset_default_graph()
   assert c.graph is not tf.get_default_graph()

body:
Maybe something like this for `tf.reset_default_graph`?: 
```

def example():
   c = tf.constant(4.0)
   assert c.graph is tf.get_default_graph()
   
   tf.reset_default_graph()
   assert c.graph is not tf.get_default_graph()

````
